metadata.title: CVE-2019-14863 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
There is a vulnerability in all angular versions before 1.5.0-beta.0, whereafter escaping the context of the web application, the web applicationdelivers data to its users along with other trusted dynamic content,without validating it.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14863` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-angularjs - 1.5.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: angular.js package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.10-1').
